title: Jacket
description: unique style and design; tapered front and back to point at center back and side vents; very complex batik pattern on dark indigo background; dark red 1\" tape insert on front edges; small purple triangle, center back yoke; five frog closings--no buttons; narrow color embroidered tape attached with metal thead throughout garment
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
